Class AbstractAdapter

java.lang.Object
  fb.datatype.ANY
      fb.rt.AbstractAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Adapter, FBInstance
public abstract class AbstractAdapter
extends ANY
implements EventServer

The abstract superclass of FBAdapter and FBInstance.
